name: Notebook Entries VOL.1
description:
8 Short Stories.

A Short Horror Game Focused on different styles and mechanics.

Focused on Tighter Circumstances to elevate Tension, Creativity, Monsters and Gameplay.

There's bound to be 1...that caresses your Fear.


Immerse yourself in... SplitScreen

Shhhhh...Don't look away...
Genre: Sound Tension

Alone//White Canvas

Non Existent
Non Existent
Non Existent

Just a Peep

Snooping Around Can Attract That Same Creepy Energy..
Genre:  Monotone Atmospheric Tension

Intermission

The Watcher..
Genre: [Redacted]

I Think I Hit Something

Whatever you hit......it has wings..
Genre: Suspense

don't look UP

Phobias aren't meant to come alive..
Genre: Walking Simulator

Repeat.Repeat.Compulsion.

My Mind's Mine...
Genre: Audio Point and Click.

a Sheep's  Gun

His Gun, His House, His Sacrifice..
Genre: Action Survival

VOL 1 : i hope this works

Runtime: 1 Hour.

1st Week Sale: Game will be $1.99 Only, Then  it's $3.99.

I hope you support my work.
Keyboard and Mouse Strongly Recommended.
Any issues please send me a message on twitter(recommended) or post on here.
